forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 67. South southwest wind 20 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 78, with temperatures falling to around 75 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 20 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph.

weather_report:
As the clock ticks toward the early hours of Wednesday, Evanston finds itself under a mostly cloudy sky, with breezes sweeping in from the south southwest, carrying the promise of a warm morning ahead. The temperature sits comfortably around 67 degrees, creating a mild atmosphere that beckons a moment of introspection or perhaps a quiet stroll along the waterfront. Although there is no precipitation in sight, the movement of the clouds hints at the changing conditions expected later in the day.

As daylight breaks, the clouds may give way to patches of sunlight, with the afternoon high expected to reach the mid-seventies. Winds will continue to be brisk, whipping through the trees and stirring the lake, which may reveal some more energetic waves as the day unfolds. It is advisable to dress in layers, perhaps a light jacket for the morning chill, giving way to more breathable attire as the sun warms the air. For those looking to embrace the day, the inviting trail along the lakefront presents an opportunity for a refreshing walk, while the wind may encourage quiet reflection under a favorite tree, providing a perfect setting to savor the seasonal change.
